body.para:
I updated the JndiLoginInitialContextFactory security actions to be consistent
with the ClientLoginModule

quote.quotepara: JndiLoginInitialContextFactory is not creating expected SecurityContext

Key: JBAS-7010 URL: https://jira.jboss.org/jira/browse/JBAS-7010 Project: JBoss Application Server Issue Type: Bug Security Level: Public(Everyone can see) Components: Naming, Security Affects Versions: JBossAS-5.1.0.GA Reporter: Scott M Stark Assignee: Scott M Stark Fix For: JBossAS-5.2.0.Beta1

Related to JBAS-6982, a SecurityContext is not resulting from the
JndiLoginInitialContextFactory operation. The result is that a SecurityContext
with a null principal and credential ends up being created by the
org.jboss.ejb3.security.client.SecurityClientInterceptor even though there is a
non-null principal and credential available.
